HeroUnit.Name: Cutup_Rookie
HeroUnit.Encyclopedia_Text: TEXT_TOOLTIP_SEPARATOR_TRAITS_BLOCK TEXT_TOOLTIP_TRAIT_UNINTERESTING TEXT_TOOLTIP_SEPARATOR_BIO_BLOCK A member of Domino Squad，Cutup was trained on the planet Kamino before being stationed on a listening post on the Rishi Moon. When Rishi Station was attacked by Separatist commando droids，the troopers were forced to evacuate. During the escape，Cutup was attacked and eaten by a giant Rishi eel. TEXT_TOOLTIP_SEPARATOR_STAT_BLOCK Health: 115 (Hero) TEXT_TOOLTIP_FIVES_P1_MOVE TEXT_TOOLTIP_FIVES_WEAP1 TEXT_TOOLTIP_FIVES_WEAP2 TEXT_TOOLTIP_SEPARATOR_CAPABILITIES_BLOCK TEXT_TOOLTIP_CAPABILITY_INFANTRY_CAPTURE

HeroUnit.Name: Droidbait_Rookie
HeroUnit.Encyclopedia_Text: TEXT_TOOLTIP_SEPARATOR_TRAITS_BLOCK TEXT_TOOLTIP_TRAIT_UNINTERESTING TEXT_TOOLTIP_SEPARATOR_BIO_BLOCK A member of Domino Squad，Droidbait was stationed at an outpost on the Rishi moon. After the station's deck officer turned up missing，Sergeant O'Niner sent Droidbait and Nub to investigate. Opening the blast door， commando droids attacked and killed them both and O'Niner，forcing the rest of the clones to escape through the ventilation systems. TEXT_TOOLTIP_SEPARATOR_STAT_BLOCK Health: 105 (Hero) TEXT_TOOLTIP_ECHO_P1_MOVE TEXT_TOOLTIP_ECHO_WEAP1 TEXT_TOOLTIP_ECHO_WEAP2 TEXT_TOOLTIP_SEPARATOR_CAPABILITIES_BLOCK TEXT_TOOLTIP_CAPABILITY_INFANTRY_CAPTURE

HeroCompany.Name: Domino_Squad_Team
HeroCompany.Encyclopedia_Text: TEXT_TOOLTIP_SEPARATOR_TRAITS_BLOCK TEXT_TOOLTIP_TRAIT_UNINTERESTING TEXT_TOOLTIP_SEPARATOR_BIO_BLOCK Domino Squad was a military unit of clone trooper cadets stationed on the planet Kamino. After an early graduation，they were tasked at guarding Rishi Station on the Rishi Moon，a strategic point on a route to Kamino. Although most of the squad perished defending the base，the survivors "Echo" and "Fives" were later absorbed into the 501st Legion. HeroCompany.Name: Ghost_Company_Team
HeroCompany.Encyclopedia_Text: TEXT_TOOLTIP_SEPARATOR_TRAITS_BLOCK TEXT_TOOLTIP_TRAIT_UNINTERESTING TEXT_TOOLTIP_SEPARATOR_BIO_BLOCK Ghost Company was a famous company of clone troopers who served in the 212th Attack Battalion of the Grand Army of the Republic. Earning fame during the Clone Wars，the company fought for the Galactic Republic under the leadership of Jedi General Obi-Wan Kenobi and Clone Commander Cody. Some members of Ghost Company， notably the troopers Boil and Waxer，wore Phase I clone trooper armor with custom light-orange markings. HeroCompany.Name: Ghost_Company2_Team
HeroCompany.Encyclopedia_Text: TEXT_TOOLTIP_SEPARATOR_TRAITS_BLOCK TEXT_TOOLTIP_TRAIT_COMMAND_TIER_01_LAND TEXT_TOOLTIP_SEPARATOR_BIO_BLOCK Ghost Company was a famous company of clone troopers who served in the 212th Attack Battalion of the Grand Army of the Republic. Earning fame during the Clone Wars，the company fought for the Galactic Republic under the leadership of Jedi General Obi-Wan Kenobi and Clone Commander Cody. The clones Boil and Waxer served in the ranks of Ghost Company，which adopted the markings of the 212th Attack Battalion. HeroUnit.Name: Keeli
HeroUnit.Encyclopedia_Text: TEXT_TOOLTIP_SEPARATOR_TRAITS_BLOCK TEXT_TOOLTIP_TRAIT_DEFENSIVE TEXT_TOOLTIP_SEPARATOR_BIO_BLOCK Keeli was a clone trooper captain who was assigned to the Outer Rim garrison，under the command of Jedi General Ima-Gun Di. During the Battle of Ryloth，he led the Galactic Republic's Outer Rim garrison against the Confederacy of Independent Systems. In a final last stand，Keeli and his men fought valiantly，but the clones were quickly overwhelmed. After surviving a thermal detonator blast，Keeli managed to shoot down a number of droids before two blaster bolts hit him in the chest.
